Package client

Class CheckMT

java.lang.Object
client.CheckMT
public class CheckMT extends Object
The CheckMT class is used to check whether a resource's parameter is compliant to the application or not. If not, then it will be returned an error message string. It is the same as the Check class, but multi-threaded
Version:
1.0-SNAPSHOT
Author:
adellafrattina

    • geonameID

      public static climatemonitoring.core.Result<String> geonameID(String geoname_id)
      Checks if the geoname id is already taken
      Parameters:
      geoname_id - The geoname id
      Returns:
      A result that contains an error message as string if the parameter is already taken, null if it is unique

    • registrationCenterID

      public static climatemonitoring.core.Result<String> registrationCenterID(String center_id)
      Checks if the specified center is present or is empty or has contiguous dashes
      Parameters:
      center_id - The center id
      Returns:
      A result that contains an error message as string if the parameter is not present, null if it exists

    • address

      public static climatemonitoring.core.Result<String[]> address(String city, String street, String house_number)
      Checks if the address is already taken or is empty or has contiguous dashes
      Parameters:
      city - The geoname id of the center's city
      street - The address' street
      house_number - The address' house number
      Returns:
      A result that contains an array of strings that is the place-holder for the error messages. The array is guaranteed to be not null with a length of 4. At index 0 is saved the possible error message for city geoname ID. At index 1 is saved the possible error message for house number. At index 2 is saved the possible error message for the general address. At index 3 is saved the possible error message from the database.

    • userID

      public static climatemonitoring.core.Result<String> userID(String user_id)
      Checks if the user id is already taken or is empty or has contiguous dashes
      Parameters:
      user_id - The user id
      Returns:
      A result that contains an error message as string if the parameter is already taken, null if it is unique

    • ssid

      public static climatemonitoring.core.Result<String> ssid(String s)
      Checks if the SSID is already present in the database or is empty or has contiguous dashes or does not have 16 characters
      Parameters:
      s - The SSID
      Returns:
      A result that contains an error message as string if the parameter is already taken, null if it is unique

    • email

      public static climatemonitoring.core.Result<String> email(String e)

      Parameters:
      e - The email
      Returns:
      A result that contains an error message as string if the parameter is already taken / is not valid, null if it is unique

      Parameters:
      user_id - The user id
      password - The user's password
      Returns:

    • monitors

      public static climatemonitoring.core.Result<String> monitors(String center_id, String geoname_id)
      Checks if the specified center monitors the specified area
      Parameters:
      center_id - The center id
      geoname_id - The area's geoname id
      Returns:
      A result that contains an error message as string if the center does not monitor the area, null if it does

      Parameters:
      center_id - The center id
      user_id - The operator's user id
      Returns:
